title: Neko, Hajimemashita: Nyantomo Kininaru Nyao
original_name: ねこ、はじめました ～ニャンとも気になるニャオ～
sinopse:
Nao Kazushiro was a goofy high school boy, but one day he became involved in a traffic accident, and for some reason swapped bodies with a nearby cat! A high school girl named Chika sees him, and ends up taking him in as her pet.

(Source: Shogakukan, translated)
